treatment-md.title: Pedinotus elongatus Belokobylskij, Castro, Shimbori, Zaldívar-Riverón, Penteado-Dias & Braet, 2017, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Taxonomic revision of the Neotropical species of the braconid wasp genus Pedinotus Szépligeti, 1902 (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Doryctinae)
